reviews.review_msg: (CRIM 220) Really confusing as the grading criteria was not clear for assignments. I would answer the question but needed to provide more outside of what was asked? 15 page paper was overwhelming so beware. Prof was accessible outside of class and listened to any concerns. TA worked against me not for me almost as if she wanted us to fail.

This class is pretty straight forward. She lectures for the first half of class and the last half is dedicated to discussions which counted towards participation. 2 textbooks were used but both can be accessed for free online. Course content itself isn't that all challenging but completing weekly readings helps with the writing assignments.
